title: Is the iPhone 11 worth buying? - Quora

response.answer_text: Short answer: yes, it is worth purchasing the iPhone 11. Explanation: now let's dig in deeper and identify why it is getting so much hype and why you should definitely upgrade to iPhone 11. iPhone 11 is one of the cheapest iPhones: yes the starting price of the iPhone 11 series is just $699. No doubt that the pro series cost $999 and pro max cost $1,099, but you save a significant amount of cash by purchasing a simple iPhone 6 with 64GB of storage. Color Choice: Apple has launched the iPhone 11 in six different colors i.e. black, white, yellow, green, purple, and red. While the iPhone 11 pro comes in 4 colors i.e space gray, silver, gold, and midnight green. Display: iPhone 11 comes with an ideal screen size of 5.8 inches, which is said to be a perfect fit for the hand. You will get an LCD screen with a resolution of 1792x828. Design: Robust glass is used on the front and backside, providing a phone with durability. The frame is made using aluminum offering users an amazing feeling while holding. The matte finishing further enhances the overall appearance. The iPhone 11 gets stereo speakers using the earpiece and a bottom speaker. Don't expect a headphone jack here or a dongle in the box. You do get a pair of EarPods with a Lightning port connector. Camera: in iPhone 11 you will find a 12MP dual camera with a wide and an ultra-wide-angle camera. The true depth camera on the front has been upgraded to 12MP. Along with the night mode feature, Apple also has the ability to record 4K videos at up to 60 fps using the front camera. Hence, the camera is claimed to be the biggest upgrade in the iPhone 11. Performance: iPhone 11 uses the new A13 Bionic chipset. A13 Bionic is a 7nm-based processor that Apple claims to deliver the fastest CPU and GPU performance in a smartphone. It's a processor that can actually withstand heavier computing than simply running basic day-to-day operations. Battery: the battery life of the iPhone 11 is mindblowing. It can deliver a full day battery life even after heavy usage. The battery health is expected to remain solid for at least a year. the phone supports up to 18W fast charging. Advice For iPhone XR users: it is advised to wait 6 months to let the prices of iPhone 11 to drop or wait for the iPhone 12 to come out in the market, which can be expected to offer a more substantial upgrade in terms of hardware and display.

If you more care about the processing power and battery life of a phone then iPhone 11 is the best choice otherwise along with these two features you require the best camera (wide angle) I would definitely recommend iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max. DISPLAYThe iPhone 11 comes with a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display which isn’t nearly as appropriate as the greater resolution ones observed on the iPhone XS and 11 Pro other iPhone products. It’s nothing to write about this feature — so most of the reviewers didn’t. TechRadar’s had a similar review over it, He said: “That visual experience is vibrant adequate and responds nicely under the finger, with vibrant sunlight performance right and the normal movie and video streaming playback robust – although not in the same way as the OLED-toting iPhone 11 Pro range.” “The thicker bezel which surrounds this display potential you don’t get the identical viewing pleasure determined on its greater expensive sibling.” “You perhaps won’t note an actual distinction while using the phone every day but by when placing these devices along with you it’s become more obvious with the Pro’s display providing a brighter and more vivid experience,” The Express said. The iPhone 11 screen is highly bright though, and you’ll be able to use it in sunlight. The negative point is there’s no more 3D touch. DESIGNiPhone 11 is available in many different colors. Unlike the very serious iPhone 11 Pro for very serious people who hate enjoyable and devour espresso flavored ice-cream, the iPhone 11 exudes it with its desire of colors. Alongside the popular black and white, you’ll additionally get pastel yellow, lavender, and mint green colors. “The iPhone 11 is basically an S replace to previous year’s very popular iPhone XR. From the front, it looks precisely the same. It has the same design, the same 6.1-inch 720p LCD with fancy rounded corners, the identical giant bezels, and the identical aluminum body,” The Verge noted. “The iPhone 11 I’ve been carrying for the past six days is the seafoam green color. I, in my opinion, would go for the purple, but all of the lighter colorings make it effortless to spot the phone when fishing it out of your Mary Poppins bag,” Wired’s reviewer said. “That plan has been made barely better: the water resistance is a little better, and Apple says the glass on the front and returned is a little stronger. The camera present on the back is now milled right into the glass, which is a variety of neat, but it’s nevertheless a digital camera bump. The whole graph remains a little surfboard-y, and it’s without a doubt now not small.” The iPhone 11 beneficial properties a new camera on the back, necessitating a new camera bump that’s much less like the refined one of the iPhone XS and greater like the Nokia 1020 fashion OEMS have been adopting lately. But it is obviously Apple, it can take a little weird. As for the front, it still has the notch and appears like an iPhone. Love it or hate it, Apple doesn’t without a doubt seem to care.
